data.author: Mike Hollister

changelog.release_notes: Termina's famous Clock Tower can be part of your pebble time, packed to the brim with intricate color detail and lush nostalgia goodness. I also have all the animated frames to make it animated watchface but have no idea how to code anything, if you wanna help e-mail me at: darkpollopesca@yahoo.com
